item.title: Make staff zones really staff only.. just need a little help please
item.dc:creator: @int_i int i
item.description:
@int_i wrote:

[quote=“the hunt, post:1, topic:291127”][quote author=int i link=topic=384726.msg2886641#msg2886641 date=1248654894]

public boolean staffzone() { if((absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) && playerRights >=1) return true; return false; }

if(staffzone() && playerRights == 0) { toX = ####; toY = ####; sM("You have been teled out of staffzone because you are not staff."); }
[/quote]

are you serious. jc just said that.[/quote]

mine works tohugh.

item.title: Make staff zones really staff only.. just need a little help please

item.description:
@Seerofdeath wrote:

[quote=“durfx, post:5, topic:291017”]lol i kno… i was asking if this was right… if this would work you know =p

public boolean staffzone() { if((absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) && playerRights >=1) return true; else toX = ####; toY = ####; sM("You have been teled out of staffzone because you are not staff."); return false; }[/quote]

where in client.java is this placed? i have problems with people glitching into staff zone…they are realy determinded…lol no mater where i put it.

item.title: Make staff zones really staff only.. just need a little help please
item.dc:creator: @Unknown_Supreme Unknown Supreme
item.description:
@Unknown_Supreme wrote:

I’ve been looking at this topic and I think I’m going to use something like this, where would I put

if (inStaffZone) && (playerRights < 1) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage("You need to be a staff member to be in this area!"); }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2009, 02:03:00 pm[/size][hr][quote=“durfx, post:1, topic:291017”][hr]i cant just try it… i wish i could… but i have to send it to the owner of the server before it works… and he is barely on
so i really wanna get it right before i send it to reduce time taken and stuff… so plz help![/quote]

Ask him what he based his server off of, and download it. That way you can test things before you send them.

item.title: Make staff zones really staff only.. just need a little help please
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

public boolean inStaffZone() { if(absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) return true; else return false; }

if (inStaffZone) && (playerRights < 1) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage("You need to be a staff member to be in this area!"); }

public boolean staffzone() { if((absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) && playerRights >=1) return true; else toX = ####; toY = ####; sM("You have been teled out of staffzone because you are not staff."); return false; }
